messages.text:
Hi!

I have just released the <https://github.com/rvignolo/RayTracing.jl|RayTracing.jl> package, which computes cyclic ray tracing across any unstructured mesh in a rectangular domain. Its results are commonly used in Nuclear Reactor Physics, such as in the Collision Probability Method or the Method of Characteristics for solving the <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Neutron_transport#Neutron_transport_equation|Neutron Transport equation>. However, this information might be useful for some other subjects I am not familiar with and that is why I would like to share this with you. Also, I will start coding the Method of Characteristic now, anyone who wants to join is welcome!
